config.name: Web Game
config.description: Web Game is a platform for playing games.

rules.title: What are the rules?
content: When two tiles with the same number collide, they merge into their sum
After each move, a new tile (2 or 4) appears in an empty spot
Win by creating a tile with the number 2048
Game over when no more moves are possible

controls.title: How to play?
content: WASD keys: W (up) S (down) A (left) D (right)

scoring.title: How is scoring calculated?
content: Score points equal to the value of merged tiles

strategy.title: Any tips?
content: Keep your highest number in a corner
Keep large numbers together for easier merging
Avoid scattering small numbers across the board
Always keep one direction as an emergency exit
